person.persName: Martin Hardin (Hardin County, Kentucky, merchant and carpenter)

body.p: Hardin County, Kentucky, merchant, carpenter, and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy Nall Hardin in Hardin County, Kentucky on January 4, 1840. Father of Sarah A. Hardin, Mary Elizabeth Hardin, and Ben Hardin. Merchant in Hardin County in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Hardin County in 1850. Carpenter in Hardin County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Hardin County in 1860. Sheriff of Hardin County in 1863.
